alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 8:13PM CDT until May 23 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Haskell County in west central Texas... Northern Shackelford County in west central Texas... Southwestern Throckmorton County in west central Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 813 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near The Intersection Of Us-380 And Highway 222, or 7 miles east of Irby, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fort Griffin around 900 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us-283, The Intersection Of Us- 380 And Highway 222 and The Intersection Of Us- 283 And Ranch Road 209. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
